newsitem.title: USA: Playtex may hit '97 double-digit EPS growth.
newsitem.headline: Playtex may hit '97 double-digit EPS growth.

text.p: Playtex Products Inc chief executive officer Michael Gallagher said the company should be able to reach double-digit earnings growth this year.

"I believe the stage is set for us to realize continued double-digit growth in infant care and Sun Care (businesses), while achieving modest growth in feminine care and household products," said Gallagher.

"If we are successful in accomplishing these goals -- while continuing to hold our promotional and overhead spending in line as we did in the fourth quarter -- we should be able to deliver attractive double-digit growth in earnings per share in 1997 and beyond."
Playtex manufactures and distributes a variety of personal care products.
